user_context.current_focus: Deployment confidence, customer feedback systems, sovereign cloud experiences

blind_spots: Tendency to seek validation through accomplishments
Setting goals too low (task-level vs outcome-level)
Asking for permission instead of help
Waiting for direction instead of identifying opportunities

key_points: Act like it's your own company
Manager is paid to enable your success, not approve it
Set ambitious goals as if you have 10 engineers
Make manager a partner in refining vision, not an approver
Focus on outcomes: deployment confidence, customer satisfaction
Use multiple data sources: feedback, telemetry, diagnostics
